definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be weary, faint (Ar. wagafa run and shew weariness)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְיׇעֵָפוּ]] consec. Je 51:58, Je 51:64; Impf. [[יִיעַף]] Is 40:28; [[וַיִּעָָף]] Is 44:12; [[יִֽעֲפוּ]] Is 40:30; [[יִיעָָפוּ]] v:Is 40:31, Je 2:24; [[יִעָָפוּ]] Hb Hab 2:13; —be or grow weary Je 2:24 (in seeking); = exhaust onself fruitlessly Hb Hab 2:13 (‖[[יגע]]), hence Je 51:58, Je 51:64 (repeated by error from v:Je 51:58); of ´[[י]] (neg.) Is 40:28 (‖[[יגע]]); youth Is 40:30 (‖ id.); the god-fearing v:Is 40:31 (‖ id.); be faint from lack of water Is 44:12 (‖[[אֵין כּׂחַ]] from hunger).
